Kurzweil thinks this is going to be the key to AI...reverse engineering the=

brain (as opposed to engineering different AI or evolving it).

You guys a=
gree? I think we'll evolve AI before we reverse engineer the brain
sufficie=
ntly to pass the Turing test. Well, I actually think that all of
these diff=
erent methods will continue to cross fertilize each other such
that no indi=
vidual thrust will be solely responsible.

If you haven't read it, this is =
a pretty provocative read:

http://www.amazon.com/Singularity-Near-Humans-T=
ranscend-Biology/dp/014303788
9/sr=3D8-1/qid=3D1171884513/ref=3Dpd_bbs_sr_1=
/105-4439563-7005215?ie=3DUTF8&s=3Dbooks

Teaser: He argues that we are all=
 going to be immortal. Well, those of us
under ~50, anyway.
